column3: â€œI'm a veteran smoker, born and raised in southern Humboldt County, and this is by far my favorite flower. Best smelling, tasting and best high. It's very hard to describe the taste ; but my best description would be blueberry /purple kush/ cheese blend . The high is very nice body high and a powerful head" high. I recommend this to patients who suffer from depression
column5: anxiety and insomnia to name a few. There...â€"

column3: â€œI'm a sativa person but this is wonderfully indica dominant. Makes me think I should sample more strains of this kind. Just  fabulous weed. A blissful evening.  I admire breeders who come up with these remarkable strains.  We have to appreciate the growers as well.  They keep the weed world alive.â€

â€œA few months ago, I returned from my non-weed hiatus of at least a decade. Things have definitely changed! I've been exploring various strains to see which works best for me. 

Blue Frost has light and fluffy buds and a mellow scent. The high doesn't hit instantly, but warms up pretty quickly and about 5-10 minutes later you're on the ride. It's got a very nice mix of mellowness and alertness. You're not zonked out a...â€

â€œI'm almost thirty years old. I used to smoke so much marijuana it was about an eighth a day. I tried to get my hands on as many strains as I could try. Then something changed in my brain wiring and I could no longer ingest THC at all without having a terrible paranoid cannabis psychosis (FULL ON! Hallucinosis, delirium, the works...) ... 

Then about a year ago I developed Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy and now I've go...â€

â€œBlue frost is fucking amazing!! Can I love this strain forever? I think I shall! Man I'm so high! And the pain in my neck is feeling much better.. 

This strain has me walking slowly with a great body high..  I truly don't want to move right now but I need to get up for water .. 

Cause cotton mouth like a mofo ğŸ˜‚

Umm back to this review 


Great for pain .. Makes me smile.. Makes me happy Makes me feel sad .. (No i...â€
â€œPretty impressive for a strain I picked up @ Bloom Dispensary in Phoenix,  I never think too much of any strain I pick up from there.  Nice smell & taste. Good day time smoke.â€

â€œThis strain smells amazing. Fruity, herbal, delicious. Vaporizes smoothly. 
High starts with an immediate burst of euphoria. Good for relaxing without getting sleepy or couchlocked. Nice mood improver; I like to use a little after work while cooking dinner. A good medicine for day or night. Helpful for migraine pain relief. A little bit of dry mouth, depending how much you use, but not bad. Highly recommend!â€
â€œamazing for ptsd cronic pain and just to unwind during an afternoon. kind of taste like blueberry cheese & hints of pepper and spice love it it is my new favoriteâ€

â€œDelicious daytime strain. Hints of blueberry and grated cheese in the flavor. Sounds a little odd, tastes amazing. High is really nice, very heady mellow euphoria, some body effects, not at all sleepy. Great first thing in the morning, or anytime of day. Also, will not keep you up like some other morning buds can. Not ideal for falling asleep, but also does not cause trouble falling asleep. Mellows out anxiety, no dr...â€

â€œSmell is very interesting... lightly floral followed by a sharp cheese scent. It's an unexplainably addictive scent , catch myself continuously smelling this strain.  Looks dark green with slight hints of blue.  I experience a calm head high with relaxation of the body.  I like this strain a lot for its versatility, being able to socialize or watch a movie.  I notice that even an hour and a half after intake I was st...â€

â€œThis strain is amazing!! I give every aspect of it top shelf. Smells great, very easy to pick up blueberry cheescake, very sweet.
Flowers were beautify colored and dense. You literally can't keep your nose out of the container, even while you're  smoking.
The high took all of 45 seconds to kick in. Smoked 1/2 king cone 1st sitting. Immediately felt the stress melting off me. Calm happy mood (and I was actually pretty...â€

â€œBest high ever, laughed for a good hour with a few friends about nothing and yet everything. It hits you hard and leaves a permanent grin on your face. My favorite thing about Blue Frost is the body tingles. Fantastic for when you're depressed or need a pick me up.â€
â€œtaste great.buds are dense and extremely frosty.dark green hues with silver over tones.Real strong body high with cerebral effects.â€

â€œBeautiful to look at and smells of slight diesel with a smooth fruity taste . Nice frosty nugs  with green foliage against blue hues ! Just pretty ! The over all buzz is a body and head sensation with it all in the head for mellow and pleasing thoughts . Can enjoy any adventure with this bus . A great pain reliever and forget about the stress indica !â€

â€œsmokin this right now.....its full of flavor definitely can get stuff done on this or go hiking very pungent nice structure...... im more of a indica leaning guy but this was an great strain to clean the room and get ready for the day.....stay medicated ;)â€

â€œLOVED this strain. Bud was crystaly, dense, oddly shaped, but overall amazing. The smell was a winter fresh mint with some weed. Minty smooth smoking in. Felt psycho-visual highs. Was energetic but relaxed. Had a very fun and talkative time with friends.â€
â€œblue frost was so good! I loved the way it smelled!  I almost didn't want to smoke it.it looked to pretty: )â€

â€œUsed for migraine pain relief--worked very well (headache about 85% gone in five minutes!) for a few hours, and then smoked some more, which again relieved the pain effectively and quickly. 

It gives me a slight mood boost, a little bit of a funny feeling on my cheeks, no munchies, not sedating.


The flowers smelled AMAZING.â€
â€œVery good for my PTSD. and Nausea.. Easily one of my Favorites - Ray E...â€

â€œBlue Frost flowers are so beautiful, dense, pungent, and potent, without cloudiness or heaviness. Definite anytime medication, its indica dominant effects work well for inducing happiness and relieving pain, without sedation.â€
â€œThis bud starts with mint/menthol and mellows into a sweet berry finish.  High was euphoric, lifting, energizing, and yet calming.  No negatives whatsoever.â€
â€œa good afternoon flower.  good scent, great smellâ€
â€œQuite heady, euphoric, outwardly stoney (squinty, red eyes), very good for depression. I'm a fan!â€
â€œOh My God, it Stink's so good! It give you a pretty relaxed high.â€
â€œOh My God, it Stink's so good! It give you a pretty relaxed high.â€
â€œI really liked the euphoric and energetic high from this.  I had a good energy about me, without feeling jittery or paranoid.  Really nice, this could become a new daytime go-to strain for me.â€
â€œa good afternoon flower.  good scent, great smellâ€

â€œLOVED this strain. Bud was crystaly, dense, oddly shaped, but overall amazing. The smell was a winter fresh mint with some weed. Minty smooth smoking in. Felt psycho-visual highs. Was energetic but relaxed. Had a very fun and talkative time with friends.â€

â€œBeautiful to look at and smells of slight diesel with a smooth fruity taste . Nice frosty nugs  with green foliage against blue hues ! Just pretty ! The over all buzz is a body and head sensation with it all in the head for mellow and pleasing thoughts . Can enjoy any adventure with this bus . A great pain reliever and forget about the stress indica !â€
â€œThis has to be one of my favorite strains, works great for depression and body pain. 10/10 would recommend to anyone. ğŸ‘â€

â€œThis is a fantastic body high. I like it as my wake and bake flower. It starts my day off pain free with a settle head high leaving a nice smirk on my face. I feel more relaxed and euphoric. This to me is exactly what you need for a relaxing Saturday!â€
â€œwas not as happy wit it as I shoulda beenâ€
â€œHigh like Jesus on a space shuttle! Only downside is made me kinda paranoid. But amazing high nevertheless!â€
â€œamazing high.  wonderful flavor and aroma.â€

â€œThis is a near perfect half & half strain. Heavy hitting. Seems like having Jack Herer in the genetics of hybrids and indicas really change its effects. I am mainly a Sativa sativa/dominant type of person, but a few indica hybrids have been intriguing me lately. This is no exception. Flavorful, energetic and some pain relief. One bong load and you'll be good to go. Or not. Good for watching funny shows or a scary mov...â€

â€œSmells like candy! Taste really good. Did give me a hardcore case of the munchies haha and I would probably recommend smoking this during the day, definitely made me feel more alert and energizedâ€

â€œFor the second time I'm sharing the day with Blue Frost, a supposed indica dominant hybrid that acts like more of a sativa dominant hybrid on me for some reason.Â  I am vaping Blue Frost in a cartridge by Select Strains, my favorite brand, and it tested at 84.7% THC and .28% CBD, which is much higher than the carts I've purchased lately so you can imagine how fast and high I am getting!Â Â 

It tastes delicious - like b...â€

â€œamazing strain, versatile is the word here. a true hybrid that shows little both indica and sativa traits. keeps you upbeat and running while being mildly stoned which is awesome. mine was 17% so it's mild and hits smooth almost menthol like tasting while smelling incredible. truly good times shit here, worth getting as much as you can get your hands on! indica chill comes later and let's you down gently like riding ...â€

â€œfirst off it has an amazing smell. blueberry muffin is the best way I can describe it. taste is very faint. mediocre high. felt like I was lead and that my body melted into the bed but I didn't lose my head too much. great for relaxing after a stressful day but not one of my favorites.â€

â€œGreat body high. not so good with pain its stull will leave you a dull pain but hey its less intense so thats a pro. Euphoric and earthy hits hard with out the harsh diesel like punch. very amazibg high overall ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ˜Šâ€
â€œNot my most favorite smoke. Was alright just not the best. the builds were airy and light.â€
â€œGot it for the pain relief, got it again for the great buzz! Gets me all tingly when I'm one toke over the line.  Doesn't give me The Fear.â€
â€œI just got 9.39g of shack. I'm pleased for sure this just took all my stress away and now I'm relieved and relaxed now. thanks!â€
â€œomg blue frost was so beautiful.  I almost didn't want to open it..it smelled so good..I loved it..took my back pain.away. .â€

â€œTaste is delicious and very smooth smoke. Takes me a while to get sleepy w/ this strain but that's OK as I enjoy the trippy head high before I get to that place.â€

â€œOne of my new favs!! Sticky big buds, giving you a dense chill sit down and relax high. If you catch a cold or flu this is a great smoke while you under the weather. Smooth and doesn't cause you to cough too much.â€
â€œDidnt get me very high at all, I seemed to have reached a small limit. Probably wouldnt purchase again.â€
â€œThis makes me relaxed and sleepy.â€

High starts with an immediate burst of euphoria. Good for relaxing without getting sleepy or couchlocked. Nice mood improver; I like to use a little after work while cooking dinner. A good medicine for day or night. Helpful for migraine pain relief. A little bit of dry mouth, depending how much you use, but not bad. Highly recommend!â€
â€œit was good tasting and mellow.â€

â€œJust recently bought this strain. It is a bit harsh on the throat. I got a nice buzz. Body relaxed and loose.  I actually got up and danced to some smooth jazz feeling the music. DoD give me a slight case of the munchies...â€

â€œHad a sample of some Blue Frost. Initial thoughts are that it is complimentary smooth and easy on the throat. Describe the flavour to be a sort of ice mint back-taste, but I hope the name of the strain didn't have a placebo effect on me. Made me feel active and gives you a happy high.â€
â€œlove the Mellow.â€
â€œIts my first encounter with this strain...its one helluva strain.â€

One bong load and you'll be good to go. Or not. Good for watching funny shows or a scary mov...â€
â€œfrom the 8th I bought, it was an awful high. none of the positive effects this states, but identical to the taste. I would almost rather not smoke this.â€

â€œMe my brother Chris and uncle capone just finished smoking this. It tasted fruity and had a kick back to my head.a very great head high and a it is a extreme energy raiser .my brother Chris is actually dribbling with no basketballâ€
â€œthis weed really helps you to forget all thats wrong and makes you want to move a bit. the taste really is unpleasant. still gets you high thoâ€

â€œThe first hit immediately gave me a good head buzz, accompanied by a rolling couch lock increasing in strength as time went on. This strain has a great blueberry flavor on the inhale, and an interestingly great mix of what tastes like Cheese OG and Blueberry Kush on the exhale. This strain's smell is slightly challenging to contain, and smells like a spicy, earthy, blueberry. It has a medium throat hit and it's not t...â€

â€œGreat body high. not so good with pain its stull will leave you a dull pain but hey its less intense so thats a pro. Euphoric and earthy hits hard with out the harsh diesel like punch. very amazibg high overall ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ğŸ˜Šâ€

â€œFor the second time I'm sharing the day with Blue Frost, a supposed indica dominant hybrid that acts like more of a sativa dominant hybrid on me for some reason.Â  I am vaping Blue Frost in a cartridge by Select Strains, my favorite brand, and it tested at 84.7% THC and .28% CBD, which is much higher than the carts I've purchased lately so you can imagine how fast and high I am getting!Â Â 

It tastes delicious - like b...â€

â€œamazing high.  wonderful flavor and aroma.â€
â€œHigh like Jesus on a space shuttle! Only downside is made me kinda paranoid. But amazing high nevertheless!â€

â€œThis is a fantastic body high. I like it as my wake and bake flower. It starts my day off pain free with a settle head high leaving a nice smirk on my face. I feel more relaxed and euphoric. This to me is exactly what you need for a relaxing Saturday!â€
â€œThis has to be one of my favorite strains, works great for depression and body pain. 10/10 would recommend to anyone. ğŸ‘â€

â€œNice fruity smell and frost on the nugs! This batch was a little leafy I wouldn't know if that is related to the strain or just sloppy trimmers but it came off easily by hand and will be used for bho soon ! Flowers out the bing have a subtle taste and burn slow. Not my favorite but definitely still a dank strain. Really hits my forehead after a few hits.â€
â€œWonderful pain reliever, best I've felt so farâ€
â€œDefinitely not an overpowered high. Very smooth taste. doesn't sink me into the couch or anything. still pretty active after smoking this. I recommend it highly.â€
â€œI had to try this strain, I enjoyed it very much, great high, an great pain reliving qualities !â€
â€œI didn't think Blue Dream would be unseated as my go-to hybrid for pain relief but these frosty nugs are my new favorite. My Blue Heaven :)â€
â€œGREAT for bedtime for me.  Makes me very relaxed all over and just ready to chill and sleep!â€
â€œNice heavy smoke, as well as smooth...great taste even when exhaling!!!! Berry scent, and very denseâ€

â€œThis oil hit fast. After 3 pulls I was feeling the tingle of the first settle in. Got lifted quick. This cartridge is going to last awhile, who doesn't like that? Munchies are for real though. I killed my fridge about a half hour after putting the pen down...fire!â€

â€œI bought some Blue Frost today because my dispensary had it on special and I couldn't afford my usual go to flower.
I was happily surprised, it has given me creative and euphoric stress relief.  I'm satisfied.â€
â€œMade all the pain go awayâ€
â€œVery good strain . good for those days when you have a lot a pain and u want to get things done around the houseâ€

â€œOverall very pleased with this strain, thick dense buds with the nice fruity taste and smell. I can medicate and still function throughout day, and that's a big plus. Have tried from a few dispensaries and has been on point Everytime.â€

â€œit really has to be the best strain for pain and depression. It smells fairly bad, i would liken it to perhaps a diaper full of indian food but the high is out of this world. my wife said my breath stank like shit adter but I dont mind because all my pain was gone. god bless this strain.â€

â€œDelicious strain. Grape undertone in the after taste, smooth velvety exhale. The high was uplifting and stable. I could function and felt talkative and happy. Nice for people who need stress relief.â€

â€œI'm a regular smoker who likes variety, so I've smoked pretty much every strain they carry at the dispensaries in the Seattle area, but this strain is one of the best. It's super relaxing and kills all of my pain, but my mind is alert and I'm not lethargic or sleepy as many indica leaning strains tend to do. I'd say it's more of a 50/50 hybrid in terms of effects, but it hits as hard as many indica strains in terms o...â€
â€œThis is surprisingly uplifting for an Indica dominant strain. This strain blew me away. The high kinda hit me like a brick wall. This is by far one of my faves.â€

â€œThis strain was a very potent. When comsumed you get a great uplifting feeling and euphoria experience. It smelled, looked, tasted, and most of smoked excellent. A strain I will most definitely go back to.â€
â€œAs frosty as a snowman!...Very mellow, smooth smoke alleviates chronic pain,anxiety,insomnia... Provides calm uplifted euphoric Bliss!     Sit down
â€œThis strain is everything it's hyped up to be. Any true smoker can agree is worth top shelf prices.  If you love great pot, this is definitely worth a try.â€
â€œThis goes on my favorites list!! Light purple hairs, soft white hue on the buds. Very good smoke. Calming and relaxing, this is a good after work strain. â¤â¤â¤â€
